articles.title: Twenty One Pilots Cover Absent Blink-182 at Lollapalooza Argentina
articles.description: Twenty One Pilots paid tribute to an absent Blink-182 at Lollapalooza Argentina with a cover of 'All the Small Things.'
articles.content: Blink-182 couldn’t make it to Lollapalooza Argentina over the weekend, so Twenty One Pilots brought a bit of Blink energy during their set filling-in for the SoCal pop punk legends. With drummer Travis Barker sidelined after surgery on his dinged fin... [1957 chars]

articles.title: Aston Villa duo ‘like family’ as key Emi Martinez transfer role revealed
articles.description: Latest Aston Villa news from BirminghamLive as Emi Buendia discusses his bond with Emi Martinez and return to the Argentina squad
articles.content:
Emi Buendia has opened up about the role Emi Martinez played in his move to Aston Villa.
The winger moved from Norwich City for a club-record fee in 2021 as Villa utilised the £100m banked from selling Jack Grealish. The Argentine was quick to build ... [1854 chars]

articles.title: Argentina-born forward Mateo Retegui called up by Italy
articles.description: Retegui has represented Argentina at under-19 and under-20 level but has never played for the senior side and has Italian citizenship through his maternal grandmother.
articles.content:
Argentina-born forward Mateo Retegui was called up for the first time by Italy coach Roberto Mancini for the upcoming European championship qualifiers.
Retegui has represented Argentina at under-19 and under-20 level but has never played for the seni... [1518 chars]

articles.title: Emilia, Big One, Callejero Fino 3rd Week at No. 1 on Argentina Hot 100
articles.description: Emilia, Big One and Callejero Fino’s “En La Intimidad” leads the Billboard Argentina Hot 100 chart for a third week, out of its five-week run.
articles.content:
Emilia, Big One and Callejero Fino’s “En La Intimidad” leads the Billboard Argentina Hot 100 chart for a third week, out of its five-week run, dating to its debut at No. 9, as it tops the March 11-dated ranking.
Karol G and Shakira’s “TQG” holds at N... [1080 chars]

articles.title: GRAINS-Soybeans firm on Argentine crop losses, wheat eyes 1st weekly gain in five
articles.description: SINGAPORE, March 17 (Reuters) - Chicago soybean futures rose for a second session on Friday with a further reduction in drought-hit Argentina's production estimate underpinning the market.Wheat rose 0.8% and was poised for a first weekly gain in five weeks as the market awaited renewal of a Russia-Ukraine export deal, while corn edged up amid Chinese buying.FUNDAMENTALS* The
articles.content:
SINGAPORE, March 17 (Reuters) - Chicago soybean futures rose for a second session on Friday with a further reduction in drought-hit Argentina's production estimate underpinning the market.

articles.title: Watch the emotional trailer for Netflix's new series about Latin American rock icon Fito Paez
articles.description: Netflix has released a trailer for its upcoming series El Amor Despues del Amor, about the life and career of Argentina's Fito Paez.
articles.content: Argentina is the birthplace of so many icons of Latin American rock, including everyone from Soda Stereo frontman Gustavo Cerati to Charly Garcia, Luis Alberto Spinetta, and Fito Paez — the latter of whom, just months after scooping up a new batch of... [1797 chars]
